title: China Gate - Samuel Fuller (1957)
description:
China Gate (1957)

Director: Samuel Fuller

Langiage: English

Cast: Gene Barry
      Angie Dickinson
      Nat 'King' Cole
      Paul Dubov	
      Lee Van Cleef	 
      George Givot	
      Gerald Milton	
      Neyle Morrow	
      Marcel Dalio

Plot: Near the end of the French phase of the Vietnam War, a group of mercenaries are recruited to travel through enemy territory to the Chinese border, to blow up an arms depot. A Eurasian smuggler, Lucky Legs, agrees to use her connections to help them, in return getting her bastard son into America. The racist father of the boy, Sergeant Brock, is also part of the multinational group. Lucky Legs must use the love of a Eurasian guerilla leader, Major Cham, to get access to the base. Will they destroy the base, and will Brock overcome his racism before Lucky Legs makes The Ultimate Sacrifice? Text by Peter Reiher - IMDB
